text: Hero is 1985 a Pakistani Urdu movie. It stars Waheed Murad, Babra Sharif, Mumtaz, Aslam Pervaiz, Saqi, Adil Murad and Nadeem. The movie was produced by Murad and directed by his friend Iqbal Yousuf. Category:Pakistani movies Category:1985 movies Category:Urdu-language movies
title: Hero (1985 movie)
